title: L'Avant-Scène
additional-notes: This is a French publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US.

The first contribution renewal shown here is the first in the registered works database that specifically mentions L'Avant-Scène.  Other dramatic or musical pieces may have also appeared in other issues, and have active renewals. We have not systematically searched possible renewals for such included content.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Peter Sullivan for copyright research on this title.
